name: SCCM Automated Patching and Deployment
desc: Led the end-to-end management of server patching using **SCCM 2012/MECM** across global assets. Automated routine tasks, including system checks and software installs, using **PowerShell scripts**.

name: Proactive System Monitoring and Reporting
desc: Implemented proactive alert monitoring and timely patch deployment workflows using enterprise tools like **Autotask, ServiceNow, Kaseya VSA, and Datto RMM** to maintain high system stability and security.

name: Core Network Infrastructure Overhaul
desc: As L2 System Engineer, handled the replacement of old routers and switches with new **Cisco** devices. Configured advanced network routes (**EIGRP, OSPF, BGP**) and set up security features like **VPN, ACL, and VTP**.

name: Cloud and DevOps Readiness (AWS/Azure)
desc: Acquired expertise and certification in **DevSecOps** and proficiencies in **AWS/Azure**, Docker, Jenkins, and Git. Focused on designing continuous integration and deployment pipelines for infrastructure-as-code practices.
